3'b000: data <= 21'b111010000000000000001;
3'b001: data <= 21'b110010000000000000000;
3'b010: data <= 21'b111011111111111111111;
3'b011: data <= 21'b000000000000000000000;
3'b100: data <= 21'b000000000000000000000;
3'b101: data <= 21'b010010000000000000101;

---------------------END--------------------
4'b0000: data <= 21'b111010000000000000001;
4'b0001: data <= 21'b110100000000000000000;
4'b0010: data <= 21'b111010000000000000010;
4'b0011: data <= 21'b110100000000000000001;
4'b0100: data <= 21'b111010000000000000011;
4'b0101: data <= 21'b110100000000000000010;
4'b0110: data <= 21'b111100000000000000000;
4'b0111: data <= 21'b111100000000000000001;
4'b1000: data <= 21'b111100000000000000010;
4'b1001: data <= 21'b010010000000000001001;

---------------------END--------------------
3'b000: data <= 21'b111010000000000000001;
3'b001: data <= 21'b110010000000000000000;
3'b010: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b011: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b100: data <= 21'b010010000000000000101;

---------------------END--------------------
3'b000: data <= 21'b111010000000000000001;
3'b001: data <= 21'b110010000000000000000;
3'b010: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b011: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b100: data <= 21'b010010000000000000101;

---------------------END--------------------
3'b000: data <= 21'b111010000000000000001;
3'b001: data <= 21'b110010000000000000000;
3'b010: data <= 21'b111010000000000000000;
3'b011: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b100: data <= 21'b001000000000000000000;
3'b101: data <= 21'b010010000000000000101;

---------------------END--------------------
